sentences.sContent: Hovering between abstraction, constructivism and surrealism, yet avoiding any specific avantgarde movement, Kertész, a Hungarian-born émigré, was guided by a personal yet rigorous aesthetic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hovering between abstraction, constructivism and surrealism, yet avoiding any specific avantgarde movement, Kertész, a Hungarian-born émigré, was guided by a personal yet rigorous aesthetic.
sentences.sCn: 这位出生于匈牙利的流亡者徘徊在在抽象主义，构成主义和超现实主义之间，但是回避任何特别的前卫运动，他由个人的，严密的审美观所引导。

remMethod.val: con(共同) + struct(建造) + iv + ism(主义) → 结构主义

words.tran: 建设性的；推定的；构造上的；有助益的
构造函数；构造器；建造者

trans.tranOther: a movement in abstract art evolved in Russia after World War I, primarily by Naum Gabo, which explored the use of movement and machine-age materials in sculpture and had considerable influence on modern art and architecture
